apa rate wada karana janathawa dirgha kalayaka patan gena giya prajathanthrawadi aragalayanhi prathipalayak lesa mewani thaththwayak athi kara ganmata haki wiya.1956 di lankawe athi wu maha deshapalana peraliya me rate samanya janathawatath, wisheshayen kamkaru panthiyatath nidahas, niwahal prajathanthrawadi jiwana apekshawan uda karanu labiya.mayi dina niwadu dinayak kirimath, sewaka arthasadhaka aramudal kramaya aarambha kirimath, kamkaru usawi athi kirimath, wruththiya samithiwalata nisi piliganima ha nidahase katayuthu kirimata awasthawa uda kara dimath, ema yugaye wada karana janathawa labu dayadayan wiya.eheth in pasu atham kuta balawega kriyathmaka wi, wadakarana janathawa durwala kala, parajaya kala awastha warinwara udawiya.

thama me rate tharuna parapura pilibanda samada dadi wishwasayakin katayuthu karana bawa da mehidi pawasu janadhipathithuma lokaye darunuthama thrasthawadaya parajaya kala ape tharuna tharuniyanta me punchi diwayina lokaye ihalama thanakata osawa thabimata da shakthiya athi bawa pawasiya.nidahas rate abhimanayen lokaya pura kirulu darannata ada ape rate kridaka kridikawanta awasthawa labi athi bawath krida kaushalyayangen piripun me rate gramiya tharuna tharuniyange krida hakiyawan op nanwimata awashya sama pahasukamak ma labadena bawath mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathithuma pawasiya.“kridawa ratakata sampathak.

wisheshayenma ee bhojanagaraye kamata dena rostad dak hewath rost kala thara mas harima pranithayi.bohomayak paribhogikayan dawalta me bhojanagaraye pirenne owun piliganwana pranitha thara masa walandannatayi.me thara masata pem bandi mamath kaden tharawek aran gihin gedaradi rost karaganna uthsaha kala namuth sarthaka une na.oya wage eka eka thanwalata aawenika rasayan athi kama warga apata nibandawama athdakinnata labenawa.chennayiwala hados klab eke piliganwana koli flawar hewath gowa mal bayit ekath ee klab ekatama aawenika kamak.kulubadu dama hondin thamba saha sos dama pranithawa unuwen piliganwana me kama wargayath gedara hadanna api noyek widiyata uthsaha kalath harigiye na.passe gedara hadanna uthsaha karana eka nawaththala klab ekenma kawa.hados klab eka samajikayanta pamanak wenwuna klab ekak nisa hamadenatama yanna ba.ape hithamithra roch ee klab eke prabala samajikayek nisa ohuta amuththan kipa denekwa athulata genayannata puluwani.masekata kipa dawasak api roch ekka oya klab ekata yanawa.habayi ee yanakotath denim ti shart ehema andagena sereppu dala giyoth athulata ganne na.hondata kalisamak shart ekak andala sapaththu dagena yanna oona.mokada klab eke dreskod eka anamyayi.risepshan eke aya harima daradanduyi.
